titles.title: FISA Improvements Act of 2013
A bill to consolidate the congressional oversight provisions of the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978 and for other purposes.

calendar.text: Select Committee on Intelligence. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Select Committee on Intelligence. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Feinstein. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 235.
